sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161050 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT ,NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130002' THEN NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130002' THEN NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130001' THEN NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130001' THEN NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130001' THEN NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130001' THEN NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130002' THEN PUOFER_ANTY + MLTYM_ANTY + PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY + SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130002' THEN PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM + MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM + PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM + SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130001' THEN PUOFER_ANTY + MLTYM_ANTY + PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY + SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY ELSE 0 END) , SUM(CASE WHEN PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD = 'Y0130001' THEN PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM + MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM + PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM + SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM ELSE 0 END) , SUM(NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM + NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM + PUOFER_ANTY + MLTYM_ANTY + PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY + SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY ) , SUM(NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM + PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM + MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM + PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM + SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM) , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161055 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE161050 AA SET PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM=NVL(( SELECT (BB.NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT + BB.NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT + BB.NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT + BB.HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT + BB.MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT ) FROM YE161050 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY
),0) /* 연금보험료합계 */ , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE161050 AA SET NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT=NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM,0)) FROM YE161055 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD='Y0130001' /* 주근무지 */ ),0) , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT=NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM,0)) FROM YE161055 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY /* 주근무지 */ ),0) , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT=NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM,0)) FROM YE161055 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD='Y0130002' /* 종근무지 */ ),0)
, MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT=NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(PUOFER_ANTY,0)+NVL(MLTYM_ANTY,0)+NVL(PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY,0)+NVL(SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY,0)) FROM YE161055 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD='Y0130001' /* 주근무지 */ ),0)
, HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT=NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(PUOFER_ANTY,0)+NVL(MLTYM_ANTY,0)+NVL(PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY,0)+NVL(SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY,0)) FROM YE161055 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PICL_EMPL_DIV_CD='Y0130002' /* 종근무지 */ ),0) , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE161050 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT ,NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT ,0 ,0 , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167040 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )

INSERT INTO YE161050 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT ,NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #npHthrWaInfeeAmt# , #npHthrWaInfeeDdcAmt# , #npHthrMcurWkarInfeeAmt# , #npHthrMcurWkarDdcAmt#
, #npHthrAreaInfeeAmt# , #npHthrAreaDdcAmt#
, #hthrPblcPnsnInfeeAmt# , #hthrPblcPnsnInfeeDdcAmt# , #mcurPblcPnsnInfeeAmt# , #mcurPblcPnsnInfeeDdcAmt# , #pnsnInfeeUseAmtSum# , #pnsnInfeeDdcAmtSum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE161050 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT=#npHthrWaInfeeAmt# , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT=#npHthrWaInfeeDdcAmt# , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT=#npHthrMcurWkarInfeeAmt# , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT=#npHthrMcurWkarDdcAmt# , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT=#npHthrAreaInfeeAmt# ,NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT=#npHthrAreaDdcAmt# , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT=#hthrPblcPnsnInfeeAmt# , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT=#hthrPblcPnsnInfeeDdcAmt# , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT=#mcurPblcPnsnInfeeAmt# , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT=#mcurPblcPnsnInfeeDdcAmt# , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM=#pnsnInfeeUseAmtSum# , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM=#pnsnInfeeDdcAmtSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE161050 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT ,NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161050 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT ,NP_HTHR_AREA_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161050 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161050 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
